trans-unit.source: Introduction to Azure Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Introduction to Azure Data Factory

trans-unit.source: Learn how you can use the Azure Data Factory service to compose data processing, data storage and data movement services to create pipelines that produce trusted information.
trans-unit.target: Learn how you can use the Azure Data Factory service to compose data processing, data storage and data movement services to create pipelines that produce trusted information.

trans-unit.source: Data Factory is a cloud-based data integration service that orchestrates and automates the movement and transformation of data.
trans-unit.target: Data Factory is a cloud-based data integration service that orchestrates and automates the movement and transformation of data.

trans-unit.source: Just like a manufacturing factory that runs equipment to take raw materials and transform them into finished goods, Data Factory orchestrates existing services that collect raw data and transform it into ready-to-use information.
trans-unit.target: Just like a manufacturing factory that runs equipment to take raw materials and transform them into finished goods, Data Factory orchestrates existing services that collect raw data and transform it into ready-to-use information.

trans-unit.source: Data Factory works across on-premises and cloud data sources and SaaS to ingest, prepare, transform, analyze, and publish your data.
trans-unit.target: Data Factory works across on-premises and cloud data sources and SaaS to ingest, prepare, transform, analyze, and publish your data.

trans-unit.source: Use Data Factory to compose services into managed data flow pipelines to transform your data using services like <linkText>Azure HDInsight (Hadoop)</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>Azure Batch</linkText><title></title> for your big data computing needs, and with <linkText>Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title> to operationalize your analytics solutions.
trans-unit.target: Use Data Factory to compose services into managed data flow pipelines to transform your data using services like <linkText>Azure HDInsight (Hadoop)</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>Azure Batch</linkText><title></title> for your big data computing needs, and with <linkText>Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title> to operationalize your analytics solutions.

trans-unit.source: Go beyond just a tabular monitoring view, and use the rich visualizations of Data Factory to quickly display the lineage and dependencies between your data pipelines.
trans-unit.target: Go beyond just a tabular monitoring view, and use the rich visualizations of Data Factory to quickly display the lineage and dependencies between your data pipelines.

trans-unit.source: Monitor all of your data flow pipelines from a single unified view to easily pinpoint issues and setup monitoring alerts.
trans-unit.target: Monitor all of your data flow pipelines from a single unified view to easily pinpoint issues and setup monitoring alerts.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Overview</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Overview</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure1. Collect data from many different on-premises data sources, ingest and prepare it, organize and analyze it with a range of transformations, then publish ready-to-use data for consumption.
trans-unit.target: Figure1. Collect data from many different on-premises data sources, ingest and prepare it, organize and analyze it with a range of transformations, then publish ready-to-use data for consumption.

trans-unit.source: You can use Data Factory anytime you need to collect data of different shapes and sizes, transform it, and publish it to extract deep insights – all on a reliable schedule.
trans-unit.target: You can use Data Factory anytime you need to collect data of different shapes and sizes, transform it, and publish it to extract deep insights – all on a reliable schedule.

trans-unit.source: Data Factory is used to create highly available data flow pipelines for many scenarios across different industries for their analytics pipeline needs.
trans-unit.target: Data Factory is used to create highly available data flow pipelines for many scenarios across different industries for their analytics pipeline needs.

trans-unit.source: Online retailers use it to generate personalized <linkText>product recommendations</linkText><title></title> based on customer browsing behavior.
trans-unit.target: Online retailers use it to generate personalized <linkText>product recommendations</linkText><title></title> based on customer browsing behavior.

trans-unit.source: Game studios use it to understand the <linkText>effectiveness of their marketing</linkText><title></title> campaigns.
trans-unit.target: Game studios use it to understand the <linkText>effectiveness of their marketing</linkText><title></title> campaigns.

trans-unit.source: Learn directly from our customers how and why they use Data Factory by reviewing <linkText>Customer Case Studies</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Learn directly from our customers how and why they use Data Factory by reviewing <linkText>Customer Case Studies</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Azure Data Factory has a few key entities that work together to define the input and output data, processing events, and the schedule and resources required to execute the desired data flow.
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Factory has a few key entities that work together to define the input and output data, processing events, and the schedule and resources required to execute the desired data flow.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Key Concepts</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Key Concepts</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Figure 2. Relationships between Dataset, Activity, Pipeline, and Linked service
trans-unit.target: Figure 2. Relationships between Dataset, Activity, Pipeline, and Linked service

trans-unit.source: Activities define the actions to perform on your data.
trans-unit.target: Activities define the actions to perform on your data.

trans-unit.source: Each activity takes zero or more <linkText>datasets</linkText><title></title> as inputs and produces one or more datasets as outputs.
trans-unit.target: Each activity takes zero or more <linkText>datasets</linkText><title></title> as inputs and produces one or more datasets as outputs.

trans-unit.source: An activity is a unit of orchestration in Azure Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: An activity is a unit of orchestration in Azure Data Factory.

trans-unit.source: For example, you may use a <linkText>Copy activity</linkText><title></title> to orchestrate copying data from one dataset to another.
trans-unit.target: For example, you may use a <linkText>Copy activity</linkText><title></title> to orchestrate copying data from one dataset to another.

trans-unit.source: Similarly you may use a <linkText>Hive activity</linkText><title></title> which will run a Hive query on an Azure HDInsight cluster to transform or analyze your data.
trans-unit.target: Similarly you may use a <linkText>Hive activity</linkText><title></title> which will run a Hive query on an Azure HDInsight cluster to transform or analyze your data.

trans-unit.source: Azure Data Factory provides a wide range of data transformation, analysis, and data movement activities.
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Factory provides a wide range of data transformation, analysis, and data movement activities.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Pipelines</linkText><title></title> are a logical grouping of Activities.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Pipelines</linkText><title></title> are a logical grouping of Activities.

trans-unit.source: They are used to group activities into a unit that together perform a task.
trans-unit.target: They are used to group activities into a unit that together perform a task.

trans-unit.source: For example, a sequence of several transformation Activities might be needed to cleanse log file data.
trans-unit.target: For example, a sequence of several transformation Activities might be needed to cleanse log file data.

trans-unit.source: This sequence could have a complex schedule and dependencies that need to be orchestrated and automated.
trans-unit.target: This sequence could have a complex schedule and dependencies that need to be orchestrated and automated.

trans-unit.source: All of these activities could be grouped into a single Pipeline named “CleanLogFiles”.
trans-unit.target: All of these activities could be grouped into a single Pipeline named “CleanLogFiles”.

trans-unit.source: “CleanLogFiles” could then be deployed, scheduled, or deleted as one single unit instead of managing each individual activity independently.
trans-unit.target: “CleanLogFiles” could then be deployed, scheduled, or deleted as one single unit instead of managing each individual activity independently.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Datasets</linkText><title></title> are named references/pointers to the data you want to use as an input or an output of an Activity.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Datasets</linkText><title></title> are named references/pointers to the data you want to use as an input or an output of an Activity.

trans-unit.source: Datasets identify data structures within different data stores including tables, files, folders, and documents.
trans-unit.target: Datasets identify data structures within different data stores including tables, files, folders, and documents.

trans-unit.source: Linked services define the information needed for Data Factory to connect to external resources.
trans-unit.target: Linked services define the information needed for Data Factory to connect to external resources.

trans-unit.source: Linked services are used for two purposes in Data Factory:
trans-unit.target: Linked services are used for two purposes in Data Factory:

trans-unit.source: To represent a data store including, but not limited to, an on-premises SQL Server, Oracle DB, File share or an Azure Blob Storage account.
trans-unit.target: To represent a data store including, but not limited to, an on-premises SQL Server, Oracle DB, File share or an Azure Blob Storage account.

trans-unit.source: As discussed above, Datasets represent the structures within the data stores connected to Data Factory through a Linked service.
trans-unit.target: As discussed above, Datasets represent the structures within the data stores connected to Data Factory through a Linked service.

trans-unit.source: To represent a compute resource that can host the execution of an Activity.
trans-unit.target: To represent a compute resource that can host the execution of an Activity.

trans-unit.source: For example, the “HDInsightHive Activity”executes on an HDInsight Hadoop cluster.
trans-unit.target: For example, the “HDInsightHive Activity”executes on an HDInsight Hadoop cluster.

trans-unit.source: With the four simple concepts of datasets, activities, pipelines and linked services, you are ready to get started!
trans-unit.target: With the four simple concepts of datasets, activities, pipelines and linked services, you are ready to get started!

trans-unit.source: You can <linkText>build your first pipeline</linkText><title></title> from the ground up, or deploy a ready-made sample by following the instructions in our <linkText>Data Factory Samples</linkText><title></title> article.
trans-unit.target: You can <linkText>build your first pipeline</linkText><title></title> from the ground up, or deploy a ready-made sample by following the instructions in our <linkText>Data Factory Samples</linkText><title></title> article.

trans-unit.source: We would really appreciate your feedback on this article.
trans-unit.target: We would really appreciate your feedback on this article.

trans-unit.source: Please take a few minutes to submit your feedback via <linkText>email</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Please take a few minutes to submit your feedback via <linkText>email</linkText><title></title>.
